data.message: To whom it may concern,is this true?--->Better to be safe than sorry. An attorney advised us to post this. Good enough for me. The violation of privacy can be punished by law (UCC 1-308- 1 1 308-103 and the Rome Statute). NOTE: Facebook is now a public entity. All members must post a note like this. If you do not publish a statement at least once, it will be tacitly understood that you are allowing the use of your photos, as well as the information contained in your profile status updates. I HEREBY STATE THAT I DO NOT GIVE MY PERMISSION. If you prefer, you can copy and paste.

replies.message: Hi, Dee. This is a hoax and untrue. Thanks for checking in with us! -Rhea
